quote.issuer_name: Hong Kong Robotics Group Holding Ltd.
quote.nm: Hong Kong Robotics Group Holding Ltd.
quote.summary: Hong Kong Robotics Group Holding Ltd, formerly China Best Group Holding Ltd, is an investment holding company principally engages in building construction contracting. The Company operates its business through twelve segments. The Building Construction Contracting segment engages in building construction contracting. The Centralised Heating segment centralized heating supply. The Customised Technical Support segment engages in building architecture and interior design. The Geothermal Energy segment engages in provision of heating and cooling supply by geothermal energy. The Project Management segment engages in construction project management. The Money Lending segment engages in money lending. The Property Investment segment engages in property investment. The International Air and Sea Freight Forwarding segment engages in provision of forwarding and logistic services. The Securities and Futures Brokerage segment engages in security brokerage as well as other three segments.
